description: A plugin for KeePass 2.x which adds multiple options to connect via RDP to the URL of an entry.

installer.script: if (installed 'keepass' $global) {Copy-Item "$dir\KeePassRDP.plgx" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins"} else { error 'Please install `keepass` first, then reinstall `keepass-plugin-keepassrdp`.'}
